title: Ambient Video Game Music - Sailing Ship
description: Embark on a nautical journey with this exquisite collection of 10 ocean-themed ambience packs.
longDescription:
Embark on a nautical journey with this exquisite collection of 10 ocean-themed ambience packs. Tailored for game developers, this collection offers a rich tapestry of maritime sounds that breathe life into the age-old charm of seafaring aboard a traditional sailing ship.


Every pack in this collection brims with the immersive sounds of an old sailing ship voyaging through the vast ocean. The rhythmic creaking of the wooden hull, each groan a testament to the ship's resilience against the unyielding sea, paints a vivid picture of life aboard a sailing vessel of yore.


Alongside the creaking, you'll find the roar of the ocean. The packs are filled with the resonant crash of waves against the ship's hull, the sound waxing and waning with the rise and fall of the tide. The endless ebb and flow provide a captivating rhythm, the heartbeat of the ocean captured in all its unpredictable glory.


This collection is an invaluable asset for game developers seeking to create deeply immersive maritime adventures. The vivid sounds of the creaking hull and crashing waves, when coupled with the masterfully designed track, promise to transport players aboard an old sailing ship, offering them an authentic and captivating seafaring experience that they can lose themselves in.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--
